actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to designate the first Monday of March of each year as Presidents Day and to make such day a legal public holiday in order to honor Presidents of the United States.

summary.text: Designates the first Monday of March of each year as "Presidents Day" and makes such day a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the first Monday of March of each year as Presidents Day and to make such day a legal public holiday in order to honor Presidents of the United States.
